title: Alan Hetherington
deck:
Although we live a few miles away from York, my wife Margaret and I love travelling in to be a part of the Gateway 'family'. We first came to Gateway in 2016 and now head the Welcome Team. I am also on the Pastoral Visiting Team.

During the week, I'm one of a small group of volunteers who drive the York Foodbank van. My other interests include gardening (we have a very large garden!), transport and travel, current affairs and lots of reading.
